mapper.select:
select a.simg,a.title,a.zans,a.adddate,a.artreads as "artreads",a.adddate,a.scontent, a.labels,a.comments,a.aid from article a where a.delflg=0
and a.title like "%"#{title}"%"
order by a.aid desc
mapper.insert: insert into article(title, content, zans, comments, artreads, adddate, upddate, delflg, userid, labels) values (#{title},#{content},0,0,0,now(),now(),0,'1','')
